A4.text: There are hundreds of breeds of the domestic pig (Sus scrofa domesticus).

A5.text: Formerly popular breeds like the Cumberland and Small White are extinct.

A6.text: Around 600 distinct pig breeds were created by farmers worldwide, mainly in Europe and Asia.
